data.eml:eml: The lestevoides species group of the genus Geodromicus Redtenbacher, 1857 (Insecta: Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shаvrin, Аlexey V. (2018): The lestevoides species group of the genus Geodromicus Redtenbacher, 1857 (Insecta: Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae). Zootaxa 4378 (2): 151-190, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4378.2.1
